defaultHabit1Text: Productive Work (Click th' pencil t' edit)
defaultHabit1Notes: Sample Good Habits: + Eat a vegetable + 15 minutes o' productive work
defaultHabit2Text: Eating thy Grimey Snail (click thar quill to change)
defaultHabit3Text: Take th' Stairs/Elevator (Click th' pencil t' edit)
defaultHabit3Notes: Sample Good or Bad 'abits: +/- Took Stairs/Elevator ; +/- Drank Water/Soda
defaultHabit4Notes: Either a Habit, a Daily, or a T'-Do
defaultHabit5Text: Tap here t' edit this into a bad habit ye'd like t' quit
defaultHabit5Notes: Or delete from th' edit screen
defaultDaily1Text: Use Habitica t' keep track o' yer tasks
defaultTodo1Text: Join Habitica (Ye should check me off!)
defaultTodoNotes: Ye can either complete this T'-Do, edit it, or remove it.
defaultTodo2Notes: Visit all th' sections o' th' bottom bar
defaultReward1Notes: Custom rewards can come in many forms. Some people gunna hold off watchin' their favorite show unless they have th' doubloons to pay fer it.
defaultReward2Notes: Watch TV, play a game, eat a treat, it's up t' ye!
